https://stackoverflow.com/a/22662963/5270873


```{r}
# extend the array 2x2x2x2 in the dimension #3
## arr <- array(rep(1:4, each=4), dim=c(2, 2, 2, 2))     # toy array
arr <- array(1:16, dim=c(2, 2, 2, 2))     # toy array
arr
```

```{r}
# create an array with the desired dimensions and fill it with NAs
arr.new <- array(NA, dim=c(2, 2, 3, 2))               # increased dimension 3

# assign the original array to the new array
arr.new[,,-3,] <- arr
arr.new
```
